content: Our research on DNS bailiwick accepted by NDSS 2026. Congrats, Yuxiao!
Invited to join the WWW2026 Program Committee.
Our research on LLM application security accepted by NDSS 2026.
One paper accepted by CCS 2025. Congrats, Dashuai!
Misty Registry has been accepted by USENIX Security 2025. Congrats, Mingming!
NOKEScam has been accepted by USENIX Security 2025. Congrats, Mingxuan!
Invited to present our work on InForSec 2025.
HADES Attack has been accepted by NDSS 2025. Congrats, Ruixuan!
XDAuth has been accepted by USENIX Security 2024.
Our research on Black Hat SEO has been accepted by USENIX Security 2024.
IDNMon has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing.
Our research on DNS glue records has been accepted by USENIX Security 2024.
Our research on Undelegated Records has been accepted by ACM IMC 2023
